item.description:
Our annual holiday gathering with dancing to Four on the Floor.
Meet for dinner at 7:30 to chat and socialize. If you wish to participate in the holiday gift exchange bring a wrapped gift in the 5-10 dollar range. If you bring a gift you can select a swap...hopefully this year the weather will participate. The band starts around 9 and we can dance the night away.

Looks like a very good turnout and we may have difficulty getting such a large reservation. If you reply you are coming for dinner please be sure you come or let us know so someone else might have your seat.
Please be sure to bring enough cash for your own dinner/drinks including tax and appropriate tip. We should plan to pay the dinner bill before dancing starts and drinks can be paid for at the bar.

It is a busy season but I hope we can all get together and say hello, have a drink and a dance for the holiday.

Dinner reservations will be accepted until 7 PM, Dec 3.
Thanks,

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Four on the Floor Holiday Get Together
